properties.description: Advertising services company based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia; 179 employees (+6.1% YoY growth); $8.1M annual revenue; founded in 2011; offers integrated marketing solutions including SEO & SEM, social media, content creation, branding, and media buying; ranked #7,820,426 globally with a strong local presence.

### 360°  communication  Services

With 360° marketing, you can effectively target your ideal customer across all relevant platforms. This comprehensive approach helps you build stronger relationships with customers by providing them with relevant content they need.

## Unlock Your Brand Potential

Riyadh ● Cairo ● Dubai

## Together We Extend

Riyadh ● Cairo ● Dubai

![Extend](https://extendad.com/wp-content/themes/extend/assets/images/icons/Hashtag.png)

### From Riyadh to the World.

Extend now is a full-service integrated company that offers a variety of marketing solutions to show your brand off with a strategic plan, intelligent thinking and creative execution.

### Our Work

FORMULA E

JEDDAH SEASON

ITHRA

YELO

Hunger Station

[View All](https://extendad.com/works/)

#### OurServices

[![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/Logo-2.png)\
\
![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/Logo-2.png)\
\
We provide the upmost value integrated services to our existing and potential clients.\
In addition to our trusted expertise in areas such as advertising, branding, social media, production, public relations and media buying, we endlessly transform to support our clients to overcome the challenges that they face by developing competitive marketing & communications strategies.\
\
Learn More _chevron\_right_](https://extendad.com/services/) [![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/ex-3-1.png)\
\
![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/ex-3-1.png)\
\
With a unique experience in advertising & marketing, our creative campaigns approach will strategically\
capture attention & raise engagement with your target audience.\
\
Learn More _chevron\_right_](https://extendad.com/services/) [![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/influencers-marketing-w.png)\
\
![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/influencers-marketing-w.png)\
\
Through our influencing marketing strategies, we make it easier for you to find & manage influencers in\
a cost-effective way.\
\
Learn More _chevron\_right_](https://extendad.com/services/) [![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/ex-3-3.png)\
\
![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/ex-3-3.png)\
\
Our video production & post-production offers a full suite of high quality content services, from scripts & shooting, to editing & color grading, all in a state-of-the-art facility.\
\
Learn More _chevron\_right_](https://extendad.com/services/)

#### Press  Center

![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%85%D8%B1%D8%A8%D8%B9%D9%87-e1704884955317.jpg)

##### Extend Calendar 2024

Explore our Extend Calendar 2024

[Read More _chevron\_right_](https://extendad.com/extend-calendar-2024/)

![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B5%D9%88%D8%B1%D8%A9-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%A3%D8%B5%D9%84-e1704794834579.jpg)

##### **المواسم السعودية تغير شكل السوق الإعلاني بالمملكة**

أضحى التطور الهائل لوسائل التواصل الاجتماعي أرضًا خصبة لنمو وازدهار السوق الإعلاني، حيث يصل فيه المعلن إلى الجمهور بشكل أسرع وأشمل مؤثرًا بدوره في القرارات الشرائية مما أوجد منافسة قوية تتصدر عبرها إعلانات المواسم السعودية مجالات المحتوى الإعلاني بكل أنواعه.

[Read More _chevron\_right_](https://extendad.com/%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d9%88%d8%a7%d8%b3%d9%85-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%b3%d8%b9%d9%88%d8%af%d9%8a%d8%a9-%d8%aa%d8%ba%d9%8a%d8%b1-%d8%b4%d9%83%d9%84-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%b3%d9%88%d9%82-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%a5%d8%b9%d9%84/)

![Image](https://extendad.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/blog-1.png)

10 March , 2023

##### QATAR: The Host Country

Without a doubt, Qatar 2022 is a World Cup of many firsts since the World Cup began in 1930.

[Read More _chevron\_right_](https://extendad.com/qatar-the-host-country/)

company.name: Extend | The Ad Network
company.about:
A trusted advisor that creates a transformative business result, through crafting and inspiring creative notions by a thoughtful innovative talented MINDS. We create solutions that fulfill the desires of people – not just a scope of work. Our competencies go beyond practices, content, services, digital and, indeed, integrated communications. 

Extend | The Ad Network is the Saudi largest integrated communications group. A leader in marketing, advertising, branding, public relations and digital communication. As an integrated hub at the juncture of marketing and digital communication among others, driven through the transformation of creativity, Extend is built to create solutions.

Extend offers its clients one stop shop access to the expertise of more than 200 talented persons across four solution hubs: creative and branding with WHY advertising, media services and digital communication with Extend, Influencers marketing with LAVAD and public relations.

Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/Extendco

Instagram:
http://instagram.com/extendad.co

evaluations.criterion: Company is headquartered or primarily operates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA)
evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile for Extend | The Ad Network explicitly states it is "headquartered in Saudi Arabia." Additional search results confirm the head office is in Riyadh, KSA, and describe the company as a Saudi marketing agency. These statements satisfy the criterion that the company is headquartered or primarily operates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
